SAINT.Name: On this day we sing the service for the Forty Martyrs
St. Theophylactus the Bishop of Nicomedia (+842-845)
Hieromartyr Priest Theodoritus of Antioch (4th C)
Apostle Hermas of the Seventy (1st C)
Venerable Lazarus (+1391) and Athanasius (14th C) of Murom
St. Felix of Burgundy, Bishop of Dunwich and Enlightener of East Anglia
